function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of germicidal emitters or sources may lead to the production of harmful by-products or chemicals.","Impact":"Exposure to harmful by-products or chemicals can pose health risks to occupants and maintenance personnel.","Mitigation":"Regular monitoring and maintenance of germicidal emitters to ensure they are functioning properly. Use of air purification technologies to remove harmful by-products from the air.","Technologies":"Air purification systems, advanced monitoring equipment for germicidal emitters.","People":"Occupants, maintenance personnel.","Owner":"Building owners, maintenance staff."},{"Description":"Inadequate humidity control in the built environment can promote the growth and spread of airborne pathogens.","Impact":"Increased risk of contagious diseases due to favorable conditions for pathogen transmission.","Mitigation":"Implementation of precise and controlled humidification systems, regular measurement and monitoring of humidity levels.","Technologies":"Humidification systems with precise control capabilities, humidity monitoring equipment.","People":"Occupants, building maintenance staff.","Owner":"Building owners, facility management."},{"Description":"Inefficient energy consumption in air conditioning operation can lead to poor indoor air quality and ventilation.","Impact":"Poor indoor air quality can contribute to the spread of contagious diseases and respiratory health issues among occupants.","Mitigation":"Implementation of energy-efficient air conditioning systems, regular maintenance and filter replacement, optimization of ventilation systems.","Technologies":"Energy-efficient HVAC systems, smart ventilation controls, air quality monitoring equipment.","People":"Occupants, building maintenance staff.","Owner":"Building owners, facility management."}]}
